medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported shifting abdominal pain since this morning, starting in the epigastric region and moving to the left lower quadrant (LLQ) and now constant and increasing in intensity since 7 AM. The pain is non-radiating. Nausea and vomiting have occurred for the past three days, with multiple non-bloody emesis episodes today. There has been no relief with bowel movement earlier today, nor with ondansetron or morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Endometriosis, morbid obesity, pelvic inflammatory disease (PID) twice. No previous surgeries.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of diabetes. Mother died of perioperative blood clot, and there is a question of an uncle with a clot. Patient has not had a formal hypercoagulable workup.
medical_history.social_history: Occasional alcohol consumption (none in recent times), former smoker. Lives on campus as a student.
